name: mower race battle
description:
How to Play at Race.

  • A:Turn Left
  • D:Turn Right
  • Space:Brake

Lawn mower cart race!?

This is race game that competes by time attack with people around the world.
The place where you cut the lawn can run fast. Let's aim for the fastest record on the changing track.

Run with the ghost of the time attack record of players all over the world and aim for the ranking first place!

how to play
Let's challenge the time attack by making a circuit selection. It will be registered in the ranking in 3 laps of time.
The location where we cut the lawn can run fast so let's devise a place to run. Let's do maintenance according to the circuit by assigning speed, steering, acceleration parameter by maintenance of mowing cart.
